thread.title: SnakeyPoo

author: SnakeyPoo
title: SnakeyPoo
text: I should have looked into the games more before purchasing this horrible bundle they sell for a low price, just because most people wont care to refund or anything i assume for it being like 2$. All games in the bundle are pretty much unfinished pieces of garbage. Buyer be warned, Bundle Stars will bundle anything together just to get your money. Proceed with caution you are probably not getting as good of a deal as you think.
